*div1 type="summary"* *p*William S. Parrott to Austin, Mexico, February 16, 1831. Asking Austin's advice about applying for contract to settle Europeans instead of Americans in grant of widow Ross.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="02-16-1831">February 16th 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Eqr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*I last had this pleasure on the *date_mentioned n="02-09-1831">9th inst*/date_mentioned* covering you a package received from an unknown hand which I am in hopes will reach you in safety.*/p*
*p*Last mail from *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*, brought me the resolution, of the *person_mentioned*Governor of your *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* in relation to the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Ross */person_mentioned*grant*/location_mentioned*, of which I made mention in my last and reads as follows*/p*
*p*" Y abiendose pasado esta instancia y Documentos respectivos al *person_mentioned*Exmo. Sor Comandte General de los estados internos de oriente,*/person_mentioned* como comicionado del *person_mentioned*Supmo Gobno General*/person_mentioned* pa entender en la colónizacion del departamento de *location_mentioned*Bajar*/location_mentioned*, con el fin de que informan sobre el particular, y Habiendo manifestado dho *person_mentioned*Gefe */person_mentioned*con fha *date_mentioned n="12-27-1830">27 de Diciembre ultimo,*/date_mentioned* que la contrata á que se refiere la antecedente solicitud se opone, al cumplimiento de la ley de *date_mentioned n="04-06-1830">6 de abril ultimo */date_mentioned*y compromete ademas la Seguridad de dho Departamento, No ha lugar a la petición que el *person_mentioned*C. Guillermo S. Parrott*/person_mentioned* hace como apoderado de la *person_mentioned*Sra Viuda*/person_mentioned* y *person_mentioned*Hermano del finado Reuben Ross*/person_mentioned*." The object of the law of *date_mentioned n="04-06-1830">6th april */date_mentioned*above refered is to prevent *person_mentioned*americans */person_mentioned*from colonizing and I would be pleased to have your opinion, as to the propriety of presenting another solicitude, proposing to settle the number of *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*required of *location_mentioned*European */location_mentioned*extract, or *person_mentioned*Europeans*/person_mentioned*, If you deem the course practicable I will renew my solicitude accordingly, otherwise I will have to abandon it*/p*
*p*Respectfully your most obt Sert and friend*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W. S. Parrott */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Indorsed by Austin: Ansd Feb 28.]*/p*
*/div1*
